pkgmetadata.longdescription: Categorical Regression Splines // Regression splines that handle a mix of continuous and categorical (discrete) data often encountered in applied settings. I would like to gratefully acknowledge support from the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC, http://www.nserc- crsng.gc.ca), the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council of Canada (SSHRC, http://www.sshrc-crsh.gc.ca), and the Shared Hierarchical Academic Research Computing Network (SHARCNET, https://www.sharcnet.ca).
